title: Wipe Clean After Eating - Novel Updates
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Bullying   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Office Romance   Sharp-tongued Characters
author: Fei Gu Niang
description:
Xia Ye is pressured by her mother to either land a golden rice bowl (good paying job) or find a golden turtle (rich husband).

So the stakes are high at her latest job interview. Driven by desperation, Xia Ye comes up with a devious plan to drive away the other candidate. Of course, things do not go as planned when the other candidate turns out to be her interviewer!>
